example.text: President Biden concedes that the migrant surge is "going to be chaotic," confessing that his own open-border policies will continue to fail miserably. This is why [[user]] introduced the Secure the Border Act. [[url]]

Watch Congressman Lamborn deliver remarks or read his remarks as prepared for delivery from today's joint press conference below: "Thank you to Congresswoman Tenney and Congressman Gottheimer for bringing us together to support the Iranian people. "I am honored that we are joined by a leading advocate for democracy and human rights in Iran, Ms. Nazanin Boniadi.

During my tour of the Amazon Robotics Sortable Fulfillment Center I learned that the use of robotics has increased the number of jobs in C005. I was pleased to learn about the use of this technology that is leading to new jobs for our community in an extremely competitive field. [[url]]

Today the UN is holding "Nakba Day," an anti-Semitic holiday mourning "the catastrophe" of Israel's founding. By celebrating this discriminatory holiday, the UN is contributing to the violent hatred of Jewish people. I condemn the UN for hosting this event. #EndJewHatredAtTheUN

On #NationalFentanylAwarenessDay, we must ensure our communities are given the necessary prevention tools and understand the severity of this lethal drug. As a member of the Fentanyl Caucus I am diligently working with my colleagues to tackle this crisis. [[url]]

Russia cannot be allowed to implement its nefarious agenda unimpeded by the West. Failure to respond invites further aggression & empowers China to consider similar actions. We must demonstrate strength in order to restore peace. Watch my interview below: [[url]] [[url]]

Pleased to support [[user]] as a cosponsor of the Save Our Sequoias Act. It's time we provide commonsense wildfire protection for all forests, and what better place to start than our nation’s iconic Sequoia groves. Watch the hearing below: [[url]]
